A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the force is strong with Disney shills. Seriously if you just remove the Star Wars part and look at how the movie is actually structured it's absolutely trash. The pacing is terrible\, the plot is weak\, there are so many useless scenes\, the list goes on. Now if you take into account the issues within the Star Wars universe itself it looks even worse. Give this movie 5 years and people will feel just like they feel about the prequels now\, which is mostly hated.
